snippet: Nick Swisher, whose father was a minor league manager and big-league coach for the Mets, recalls his springs in Port St. Lucie on his own way into baseball.
abstract: New York Yankees outfielder Nick Swisher, whose father Steve Swisher was a member of the New York Mets coaching staff in 1990s, recalls spending part of his childhood at the Mets training camp.
lead_paragraph: Nick Swisher, whose father was a minor league manager and big-league coach for the Mets, recalls his springs in Port St. Lucie on his own way into baseball.

headline.seo: Swisher, Yankees Outfielder, Grew Up in Mets Camp
headline.main: Long Before He Was a Yankee, Swisher Grew Up in the Mets’ Camp
headline.print_headline: Long Before He Was a Yankee, Swisher Grew Up in the Mets’ Camp
